Package Client

package Client
  • Class
    Description
    BistroClient
    Client-side network component of the Bistro system.
    ClientController
    JavaFX controller for the Bistro client application.
    ClientSession
    Manages the client-side session state for the Bistro application.
    ClientUI
    Defines the callback interface for client-side UI components.
    CurrentDinersRow
    Represents a single row in the "Current Diners" table.
    LoginController
    JavaFX controller for the login screen.
    PayBillController
    JavaFX controller for the "Pay Bill" screen.
    ReservationFormController
    JavaFX controller for the reservation creation form (popup/window).
    ReservationRow
    Represents a single reservation row displayed in JavaFX TableView components.
    SceneManager
    Central navigation utility for switching between JavaFX scenes (FXML screens).
    StaffController
    Staff dashboard controller (Agent/Manager) for managing restaurant operations.
    SubscriberRow
    JavaFX row-model for displaying Subscriber data in a TableView.
    TerminalController
    Controller for the public terminal screen.
    TerminalEntryController
     
    WaitingListRow
    A lightweight table-row model for displaying waiting list entries in JavaFX tables.
